title: OMG why is every single game so one sided...
body:
is it just me or in every single game, either your team snowballs way out of control and gets a score like 46/7 or their team does?

who else gets this?

i get it almost every game, I'm so sick of it, it saps the fun right out of Lol, its basically a 50/50 chance as to who will spiral out of control, why even play when i can just toss a coin for an answer, and not spend 40 mins mindlessly crushing others or mindlessly being crushed myself.

My last 4 games are the perfect example:

Loss: 
7/24

Win: 
26/10

Win: 
34/18

Loss: 
29/66

replies.body: Every game last season was one-sided, idk what youre on about.
I've had quite a few dam close games.

Well consider a few facts.

1. The game is super snowbally due to gold on the map.
2. Normals MMR is fucked atm, not entirely sure why but i think they did a reset on it like 6 months ago.
3. Lane dominance generally means that the person is better then the other.

So basically it becomes whoever wins 2/3 lanes wins, because generally speaking the keystones and the sheer gold available in those lanes makes it impossible for 1 lane to fully carry the entire game.

Because of the gold value in the Keystones as well a lot of cases people will get ahead and be able to skip to the damage items over say the lifesteal (ADC's) as lifesteal is now basically in built.

Current tower worth: 775 (125 each and 150 split for nearby people)

And the jungler has to gank to get global gold because they can't get dragon to do so (A reason as to why junglers can't pull from behind because of turret gold.).

And on top of this a lot of people are buying guinsoo's which is worth 6k gold and costs 2.5k, so that just scales gold worth as well (there are a few items that are extremely efficient right now.)

I've actually had a few games where we started 0-10 and team was saying GG - game over fed(whoever fed) - GG no kills or objectives.

Then we actually started using teamwork we took baron and we won. (http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/112077876/200774848 )

But no, a lot of my games normally go win early lose late or lose early win late.

Yeah. Riot made it super snow bally by making the turrets super weak and making vision control harder to maintain.

But thats why its preseason. To test if sht works or not. Next patch they are making turrets a little tougher and lowering the XP you get from kills to try and stop the probably 18 minute average games right now.

According to Reinboom there were also changes to how XP is calculated in this patch that weren't in the patch notes which also led to people who get early kills getting a pretty much a full level lead. GG.
